title: CUIConfig
description: JSON schema for the CubicsUI CLI configuration file

envOptions.description: Options about the current project's environment.

typescript.description: Set to true if the project is using TypeScript. This will be detected when you run `cui init`.

styleModulePattern.description: The components style module's wildcard pattern. If the component file is in `./dir/abc.jsx` then the style for the component must be in `./dir/abc.module.css`.

documentationPattern.description: The documentation file's wildcard pattern. If the component file is `./dir/abc.jsx` then the documentation for the component will be `./dir/abc.md`.

libraryOptions.description: Options containing information about the library, with which the components are associated.

libraryName.description: Name of the selected library in the database where the components can be found. If the library doesn't exist then it is created in the database.

baseUrl.description: This is used by cui to know where the root of the library is located. `baseUrl` is taken from the nearest `tsconfig.json` or `jsconfig.json`. If none of these exist then it defaults to current working directory.
